title: Brought to Tears

en: Finally, finally new feedback is mostly positive. In fact, you received a touching e-mail today from a tester who is excited about what you're doing.
They're a young college student, and hope that someday they'll be able to make something like this. The thought unexpectedly brings you to the verge of tears.

no_caption: Try not to think about it

en: Internally, you accept what the person says. You're happy about it, but it's also overwhelming. The feelings stirred up distract you for the rest of the day.
You compartmentalize the feelings aside to focus on your work. You don't have room to process this right now.
